articles.title: SJVN arm to supply 600 MW solar power to Rajasthan - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Under the Agreement, SGEL would supply 500 MW of power at a tariff of Rs. 2.57 per unit, from the 1,000 MW Bikaner Solar Power Project being developed by SGEL under Phase-II (Tranche-3) of the Central Public Sector Units Scheme.
articles.content:
A subsidiary of state-owned power producer SJVN, SJVN Green Energy, has entered into a long-term pact to supply 600 MW solar electricity to Rajasthan.
